title: The Plot Thickens  ( Is Drake Excused)
itunes:title: The Plot Thickens  ( Is Drake Excused)
description:
Thursday 5/31- Today on the show the plot thickened between the Drake and Pusha T beef after Drake put out a statement defending his "black face photo". Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners are giving Drake a pass for his statement. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman that stabbed her 6 year old child several times and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 5/31- Today on the show the plot thickened between the Drake and Pusha T beef after Drake put out a statement defending his "black face photo". Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners are giving Drake a pass for his statement. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman that stabbed her 6 year old child several times and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
